headline.main: First Draft Focus: Getting It Right in the Bronx

snippet: Surrounded by a news media crush, Gov. John Kasich of Ohio feasted on Italian food at Mike’s Deli on Arthur Avenue in the Bronx on Thursday. His culinary adventure went a lot smoother than a stop in Queens last week, when he ate pizza with a fork. “We love New York values,” he told reporters Thursday, adding that “great food” was part of what constituted those values.
